医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
疫苗接种拯救生命 50 年：世卫组织的 EPI 拯救了 1.54 亿人的生命自 1974 年以来，世界卫生组织的扩大免疫计划 (EPI) 已避免了 1.54 亿人死亡，显着降低了全球婴儿死亡率，并因疫苗接种而贡献了 102 亿年的健康寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/50-years-of-life saving-vaccinations-WHOs-EPI-saves-154-million-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240507/50-years-of-life saving-vaccinations-WHOs-EPI-saves-154-million-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aea223b1-aab8-4eef-8788-7b42223aa270 Tue, 07 May 2024 00:03:00 -0400 50 years of lifesaving vaccinations: WHO's EPI saves 154 million lives
研究将生命早期接触烟草与加速衰老联系起来，敦促采取预防措施《科学进展》最近的一项研究发现，生命早期接触烟草，包括在子宫内和早期开始吸烟，会加速生物衰老，强调了减少接触烟草对改善健康结果的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-links-early-life-tobacco-exposure-to-accelerated-aging-urging-preventive-action.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-links-early-life-tobacco-exposure-to-accelerated-aging-urging-preventive-action.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18da75ed-c136-4343-aa48-a161ca636bb9 Mon, 06 May 2024 23:30:00 -0400 Study links early-life tobacco exposure to accelerated aging, urging preventive action
研究发现神经回路是人体免疫反应的关键调节因子《自然》杂志最近的一项研究揭示了体脑轴内的特定神经回路如何调节免疫反应，强调了免疫疾病的潜在新治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Neural- Circuits-revealed-as-key-regulators-in-bodys-immune-response-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Neural- Circuits-revealed-as-key-regulators-in-bodys-immune-response-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbc73703-56b5-40b6-8a6b-4977002ee6d6 Mon, 06 May 2024 23:18:00 -0400 Neural circuits revealed as key regulators in body's immune response, study finds
新研究发现维生素 E 水平与骨关节炎之间没有因果关系最近的一项研究使用孟德尔随机化来探索骨关节炎 (OA) 和 α-生育酚（维生素 E 的一种形式）之间的联系，但没有发现两者之间存在因果关系的证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/New-research-finds-no-causal-link- Between-vitamin-E-levels-and-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/New-research-finds-no-causal-link- Between-vitamin-E-levels-and-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7416fe13-fbc1-42d1-ae60-1dc1cf73a07e Mon, 06 May 2024 20:20:00 -0400 New research finds no causal link between vitamin E levels and osteoarthritis
通过胶束封装有效鼻内递送阿戈美拉汀宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。阿戈美拉汀（AGO）是一种抗抑郁药，由于水溶性差、肝降解严重和脑内分布差导致生物利用度低，临床应用有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Efficient-intranasal-delivery-of-agomelatine-via-micellar-encapsulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Efficient-intranasal-delivery-of-agomelatine-via-micellar-encapsulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=744917c0-d1af-4f79-b90a-9c0cd6892fb8 Mon, 06 May 2024 14:11:00 -0400 Efficient intranasal delivery of agomelatine via micellar encapsulation
MedStar 华盛顿医院中心招募第一位美国患者参加心脏病基因编辑治疗试验第一位参与直接注入体内的新型基因编辑疗法研究的美国心脏病患者已在 MedStar 华盛顿医院中心成功入组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/MedStar-Washington-Hospital-Center-enrolls-first-US-病人-in-gene-editing-therapy-trial-for-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/MedStar-Washington-Hospital-Center-enrolls-first-US-病人-in-gene-editing-therapy-trial-for-heart-disease.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11860eb9-960d-4e08-a803-520fc498a4e1 Mon, 06 May 2024 14:04:00 -0400 MedStar Washington Hospital Center enrolls first U.S. patient in gene-editing therapy trial for heart disease
CRISPR基因编辑有望治疗遗传性失明患者对 14 名遗传性失明患者进行的突破性 CRISPR 基因编辑临床试验的结果表明，该治疗是安全的，并且 11 名接受治疗的参与者的病情得到了显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/CRISPR-gene-editing-shows-promise-for-treating-individuals-with-a-form-of-inherited-blindness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/CRISPR-gene-editing-shows-promise-for-treating-individuals-with-a-form-of-inherited-blindness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fddb8ac-7b68-4eaa-bf58-f06aebe6213b Mon, 06 May 2024 13:03:59 -0400 CRISPR gene editing shows promise for treating individuals with a form of inherited blindness
研究揭示了虚拟现实在治疗抑郁症方面的前景《JMIR 心理健康》杂志上发表的一项新研究揭示了虚拟现实 (VR) 在治疗重度抑郁症 (MDD) 方面的前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-sheds-light-on-the-promising-role-of-virtual-reality-in-treating-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Study-sheds-light-on-the-promising-role-of-virtual-reality-in-treating-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da97b81b-ede5-422c-a836-8d5dde9f59f6 Mon, 06 May 2024 12:55:47 -0400 Study sheds light on the promising role of virtual reality in treating depression
植物性药物可能是帮助人们戒烟的有效疗法1100 万美国成年人使用电子烟来吸食尼古丁，其中大约一半的人表示想戒掉，但许多人却难以戒烟，因为尼古丁是一种成瘾药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Plant-based-medication-may-be-an- effective-therapy-to-help-people-quit-vaping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Plant-based-medication-may-be-an- effective-therapy-to-help-people-quit-vaping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=502cd9de-059b-41db-8357-80caf336b23b Mon, 06 May 2024 12:50:00 -0400 Plant-based medication may be an effective therapy to help people quit vaping
儿童时期的久坐行为和低活动水平与青春期的心脏紧张有关根据芬兰于韦斯屈莱大学最近进行的一项研究，童年时期的久坐行为和缺乏身体活动会给青春期的心脏带来压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Sedentary-behavior-and-low-activity-levels-in-childhood-linked-to-heart-strain-in-adolescent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240506/Sedentary-behavior-and-low-activity-levels-in-childhood-linked-to-heart-strain-in-adolescent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1c02ede-67be-4239-9ded-4bc288b87d69 Mon, 06 May 2024 12:45:00 -0400 Sedentary behavior and low activity levels in childhood linked to heart strain in adolescence
